short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HandyPaste, a versatile browser extension, streamlines text-pasting for commonly used content like emails, addresses, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing HandyPaste, a versatile browser extension designed to streamline your text-pasting experience. Say goodbye to the hassle of repeatedly entering commonly used texts, whether they be emails, addresses, cryptocurrency wallet addresses, JSONs, XMLs, URLs, social media URLs, phone numbers, and more.

This extension seamlessly integrates with browser APIs and syncs effortlessly with your account for a personalized and convenient usage. It's important to note that while HandyPaste enhances your efficiency, it does not currently encrypt stored values. Consequently, we advise against saving sensitive data within the extension. Elevate your text-pasting game with HandyPaste, the go-to solution for quick and efficient access to frequently used content.
